[Infinite HP]
D3000000 16EB2DA0
D3000001 1712A010
FC000000 00000004
D2000000 00000000

[Infinite SP]
D3000000 16EB2DA4
00000000 42C80000
D2000000 00000000

[Infinite S. Skill]
D3000000 16EB2DA8
00000000 43000000
D2000000 00000000

[Stackable Storage x99]
D3000000 0073F058
A0000000 FF0000FF
DB000001 00000000
D3000000 00700F40
C1000000 00000000
DC000000 0003B400
D1000000 00000000
DC000000 00007598
C0000000 000005DC
80000004 000005C4
70000004 000009FF
2000000A 00000063
D0000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 0000003C
D1000000 00000000

[++Flag codes++]

[Save to activate DLC]
D3000000 00723289
DB000000 00000000
F7000000 00000008
D8000000 00000000
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
{Quit game and load save again to see the effect (or leave this on when loading your save).\n\nChanges multiplayer version to 1.0.1 and enables all DLC content like official DLC saves.\n\n100% identical effect to loading your game with the DLC installed.}

[Save to deactivate DLC]
D3000000 00723289
DB000000 00000000
F6000000 000000F7
D8000000 00000000
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
{Quit game and load save again to see the effect (or leave this on when loading your save). Fails if the DLC is installed (the bit will be flipped back on by the game).\n\nDisables access to locked/repeatable DLC features - but doesnt remove, affect, or revert items/upgrades/story already unlocked.\n\n TLDR, this lets you use a DLC save to play with with nonDLC saves.}

[Enable Snapshots]
D3000000 00723289
DB000000 00000000
F7000000 00000040
D8000000 00000000
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
{[Re-]enables Snapshots for spur-of-the-moments reasons.\n\nYou can re-activate snapshots in-game without cheats by talking to the Link Clerk in the Guild Office}

[Disable Snapshots]
D3000000 00723289
DB000000 00000000
F6000000 000000BF
D8000000 00000000
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
{Prevents the annoying tendancy to take a snapshot every time you open the plugin menu - or forget the bag opens with Y and not Start}

[--]

[++Equipped Weapon Codes++]

[Crafting Effect Changer]
D5000002 000000EE
DF000001 00000001
F6000000 7FFFFFFF
DFFFFFFF 00000002
40000000 00000240
D2000000 00000001
D0000000 00000000
DFFFFFFF 00000000
D3000000 0073F058
A0000000 FF0000FF
DB000001 00000000
D3000000 00700F40
C1000000 00000000
DC000000 0003B400
D1000000 00000000
DC000000 00000060
C0000000 000001F4
6000000C 00010001
DC000000 0000003C
D0000000 00000000
D1000000 00000000
5000000C 00010001
D7000002 00000016
DC000000 FFFFFFFE
D0000000 00000000
{Set the effect ID at the end of line 1\n\nFull list can be found at\nhttps://pastebin.com/raw/yim3Emug\n\nREMEMBER TO SWITCH THE BYTES\n\nInvalid IDs will be rejected to avoid crashes}

[Crafting Quality Changer]
D5000002 00000004
DF000001 00000001
F6000000 7FFFFFFF
DFFFFFFF 00000002
40000000 00000004
D5000002 00000004
D0000000 00000000
DFFFFFFF 00000000
D3000000 0073F058
A0000000 FF0000FF
DB000001 00000000
D3000000 00700F40
C1000000 00000000
DC000000 0003B400
D1000000 00000000
DC000000 00000060
C0000000 000001F4
6000000C 00010001
DC000000 0000003C
D0000000 00000000
D1000000 00000000
5000000C 00010001
D8000002 00000014
DC000000 FFFFFFFF
D0000000 00000000
{Set the quality at the end of line 1\n\n4 = Divine\n3 = Top\n2 = Great\n1 = Good\n0 = Normal}

[Crafting ATK Bonus Changer]
D5000002 00000397
D3000000 0073F058
A0000000 FF0000FF
DB000001 00000000
D3000000 00700F40
C1000000 00000000
DC000000 0003B400
D1000000 00000000

DC000000 0000003C

D6000002 0000001C
DC000000 FFFFFFFC
D0000000 00000000
{Set the effect ID at the end of line 1\n\nEnter as Hexadecimal Integer. Code automatically converts to Float\n\nNegative values work too!}

[++Equipped Crafting Tool Codes++]

[++For best results, Only equip 1 crafting tool++]

[Crafting Effect Changer]
D5000002 000000EE
DF000001 00000001
F6000000 7FFFFFFF
DFFFFFFF 00000002
40000000 00000240
D2000000 00000001
D0000000 00000000
DFFFFFFF 00000000
D3000000 0073F058
A0000000 FF0000FF
DB000001 00000000
D3000000 00700F40

D1000000 00000000

C0000000 000001F4
6000000C 00000001
DC000000 0000003C

D1000000 00000000
5000000C 00000001

D0000000 00000000
{Set the effect ID at the end of line 1\n\nFull list can be found at\nhttps://pastebin.com/raw/yim3Emug\n\nREMEMBER TO SWITCH THE BYTES\n\nInvalid IDs will be rejected to avoid crashes}

[Crafting Quality Changer]
D5000002 00000004
DF000001 00000001
F6000000 7FFFFFFF
DFFFFFFF 00000002
40000000 00000004
D5000002 00000004
D0000000 00000000

D3000000 0073F058
A0000000 FF0000FF

D3000000 00700F40

D1000000 00000000

DC000000 FFFFFFFF
D0000000 00000000
{Set the quality at the end of line 1\n\n4 = Divine\n3 = Top\n2 = Great\n1 = Good\n0 = Normal}

[Tool Power Bonus Changer]
D5000002 00000397
D3000000 0073F058
A0000000 FF0000FF
DB000001 00000000
D3000000 00700F40
C1000000 00000000
DC000000 0003B400
D1000000 00000000
DC000000 00000060
C0000000 000001F4
6000000C 00000001
DC000000 0000003C
D0000000 00000000
D1000000 00000000
5000000C 00000001
DF000001 00000001
DFFFFFFE 00000011
D6000002 00000028
DC000000 FFFFFFFC
D0000000 00000000
{Set the effect ID at the end of line 1\n\nEnter as Hexadecimal Integer. Code automatically converts to Float\n\nNegative values work too!}

[--]

[--]

[++Equipped Gathering Tool Codes++]

[++Pickaxe++]

[Crafting Effect Changer]
D5000002 000000EE
DF000001 00000001
F6000000 7FFFFFFF
DFFFFFFF 00000002
40000000 00000240
D2000000 00000001
D0000000 00000000
DFFFFFFF 00000000
D3000000 0073F058
A0000000 FF0000FF
DB000001 00000000
D3000000 00700F40
C1000000 00000000
DC000000 0003B400
D1000000 00000000
DC000000 00000060
C0000000 000001F4
6000000C 00080001
DC000000 0000003C
D0000000 00000000
D1000000 00000000
5000000C 00080001
D7000002 00000024
DC000000 FFFFFFFE
D0000000 00000000
{Set the effect ID at the end of line 1\n\nFull list can be found at\nhttps://pastebin.com/raw/yim3Emug\n\nREMEMBER TO SWITCH THE BYTES\n\nInvalid IDs will be rejected to avoid crashes}

[Crafting Quality Changer]
D5000002 00000004
DF000001 00000001
F6000000 7FFFFFFF
DFFFFFFF 00000002
40000000 00000004
D5000002 00000004
D0000000 00000000

D0000000 00000000
{Set the quality at the end of line 1\n\n4 = Divine\n3 = Top\n2 = Great\n1 = Good\n0 = Normal}

[++Old Fort42 codes (most only work for save #1)++]

[Inf. Dosh (9,999,999)]
00720C0C 0098967F

[Max Level]
00720C04 004F5A5B

[Infinite Magic]
D3000000 10000000
16EB2DA6 000042C8

[Infinite HP (200)]
D3000000 10000000
16EB2DA2 00004348

[Have 99 Stat Points]
00720C00 00000063

[999 gold lunares coins]
00720EC4 000003E7

[999 silver lunares coins]
00720EC8 000003E7
